nodes.text: Eradicus was a Sith Lord who lived during the New Sith Wars, serving the Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Ruin as a squire. Lord Eradicus wore a set of dark armor, a type of plate armor that was infused with the dark side of the Force.

Eradicus was first mentioned in the 2012 publication Book of Sith: Secrets from the Dark Side. The author Daniel Wallace took the character's name from Abel G. Peña, who abandoned the name Eradicus he once planned for the character ultimately named Darth Ruin.
